FIELD_NAME: cryostat

FULL_PATH: cryostat/description_2d/cryostat/unit/annular/thickness
IDS: cryostat
HIERARCHY_DEPTH: 5
TOTAL_CONTEXT_LEVELS: 6
PARENT_CONTAINER: cryostat/description_2d/cryostat/unit/annular
FIELD_NAME: thickness
IS_LEAF_FIELD: True
PATH_COMPONENTS: cryostat -> description_2d -> cryostat -> unit -> annular -> thickness

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Thickness of the vessel layer  in the perpendicular direction to the centreline. Thickness(i) is the thickness of the layer between centreline/r(i),z(i) and centreline/r(i+1),z(i+1), so its size is equal to the length of centreline/r-1 if the thickness is varying. If the thickness is constant for all points, allocate this node to size 1 to store a single value.

PRIMARY_DESCRIPTION: Thickness of the vessel layer  in the perpendicular direction to the centreline. Thickness(i) is the thickness of the layer between centreline/r(i),z(i) and centreline/r(i+1),z(i+1), so its size is equal to the length of centreline/r-1 if the thickness is varying. If the thickness is constant for all points, allocate this node to size 1 to store a single value.
